last_comment: Major Airlines will increase flights by 25,000 in August over what they have planned in July, and 3x the number in June.  United alone, will add 350 daily flights from U.S. hubs... Flights from Newark will double... so I guess there is no need to test airport personnel (???).  Get ready for more news, this is just the beginning of a new model for remote employee healthcare testing and diagnostics.

AWFTDDAW67DAOQHDLDKFI7BIRE.body: Major Airlines will increase flights by 25,000 in August over what they have planned in July, and 3x the number in June.  United alone, will add 350 daily flights from U.S. hubs... Flights from Newark will double... so I guess there is no need to test airport personnel (???).  Get ready for more news, this is just the beginning of a new model for remote employee healthcare testing and diagnostics.

NKFVHNGAXVNPMMLX7ZGC6VBBWE.body: Where is Satzman to explain why zero tests are scheduled on the HyperPoint Workflow schedule....maybe HyperPoint messed up the schedule software and people aren’t allowed to reserve a time.....

PF7GDY7DDILA4TFFNHW3G23T3E.body: Too much talk in here (24/7).   There are  lovers and haters of this stock who post here day and night. However, there is no need to call people names or put them down because of the decisions they make. Most people on here are amateurs with a few thousand shares and have very little experience, training or education in finance to really understand economics and world markets.  This is a very small company at the right time at the right place who's success will depend on execution and strategies. I personally believe they will do well   but you may not going to enjoy the ride if you are glued to your screen 24/7. For those who lost money with this play it does not make sense to stick around and badmouth the company. You've made a decision to buy and sell so the responsibility is yours, you don't need to take your anger out on other people who are patiently waiting for a payday and willing to take the risk of riding out this volatility.  And if you are a day trader, I'm pretty sure there are  a lot more attractive plays out there.  Overall mutual respect is very important and treating others they way you want to be treated is still key in life.

HLITELSPXIO3EFA6R56UBEW5GE.body: Just heard that XSPA got alerted at (http://tradenow.xyz). I hope it pushes us higher!

KPCI5MGOP2JH75QKKYZYGFV7PE.body:
For the two numnuts on the board....if you arent buying or shorting XSPA, why are you here? Nothing better to do, live in an alternate reality, disgruntled employee, former investor that lost a bunch? Nothing you have brought up is factual or is scaring off any potential investors or anyone holding the stock....nothing better to do while being quarantined? I suggest you go on StockTwits with your shtick, as 60,000 are currently watching the XSPA message board on there.

GL to all Bulls, we all know the potential of what we have. BDD is making all the right moves, patience!

4ZPSQNDFWWXUMQFYC7NYGCJH6E.body: Have you guys looked at TPTW? I bought in, it has not taken off yet, but looks like a good idea, it’s still really low

6YV5LGTVQXJNIYOIXWKIQYJMHM.body: You could take some profit on this short term, but the real money is buying and holding! It continues to go up from being a great idea from a company in the wrong place at the right time! This is happening at all airports and other traveling agencies nationwide!!!

7RZXKYQ3TQOAEEURBG5QSFPYTE.body: WATCH OUT FOR THE POWER HOUR!!! LFGGGG
